name: The Dirty Jane
description:
New York is a dirty town. And not much is dirtier, or more New York, than the house drink at Jane, a restaurant in the West Village -- the Dirty Jane. It's a pickled martini. Any questions?

The Dirty Jane is a gimmick, and it is also a great cocktail. Part martini, part deli sandwich, it is a vodka martini, no vermouth, with a wedge of pickled green tomato instead of an olive. A splash of the pickle brine makes it ''dirty,'' as a splash of olive brine would make it a straight ''dirty martini.'' The drink itself is a clear liquid.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce liquid from pickled green tomatoes
Thin wedge of a pickled green tomato for garnishing the rim

recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker filled with ice, combine vodka and pickling liquid. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with tomato wedge.
